document_data.caption: A map showing the River Mintar flowing out of the Thornwood.
document_data.name: River Mintar
document_data.mainbody: The '''River Mintar'''<ref group="note">The map included with the 3rd edition Forgotten Realms Campaign setting names the river the River Minta, but this is believed to be a typo. was a small waterway found near the [[Lake of Steam]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Geography: The river originated within the western region of the [[Thornwood]]. It flowed south and west for approximately {{SI|200|mi|k|long=yes}} before emptying into the Lake of Steam.
document_data.Notable Locations: The city of [[Mintar]] was founded along the river's western bank where it met the sea.
